= Category requests =

Content:

== Category Get == 
|| request URL || *(HTTP)* `/category/get/` || 
|| method || *GET* ||
|| description || Get children of category with given `parent_id`,whole list all together or specific (listed) objects ||

*Prameters:*

NO ALE PO CO TO WSZYSTKO SKORO USTALILIŚMY, ŻE ŚCIĄGAMY CAŁOŚĆ??

|| *parameter* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `session_key` || String || User's current session key ||
|| `ids` || `List<Long>` || Get [DatatypesCategory category objects] of specific ids ||
|| `parent_id`  || `Long` || Get children of category with given `parent_id` ||
|| `get_all` || Boolean || If `true` give all category objects || 
|| `has_version` || `Long` || <font color="red"> NOT SUPPORTED YET. </font> Client admits having category tree of given version. Server will update client's tree and try to limit the transfer. All retrieved objects should overwrite existing ones || 

_*NOTE:*_
  * `parent_id=NULL` means children of `root` category element 

*Returns:*

[DatatypesCategory Category] structures.
